==Japanese==

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|日々}} {{qualifier|using the [[ditto]] mark {{ja-l|々}} for the duplicated character}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|ひ|ひ|k2=び|yomi=k|r=y}}
[[reduplication|Reduplication]] of {{m|ja|日|tr=hi||sun; day}}. {{rendaku2|sort=ひび|hi|bi}}

This is generally the most common reading for this kanji compound.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ひび|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Adverb====
{{ja-pos|adverb|ひび}}

# [[day by day]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''日日'''暑くなるね。|'''ひび''' あつく なる ね。|It's getting hotter '''day by day''', isn't it.}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|毎日|まいにち}}
* {{ja-r|日毎|ひごと}} {{qualifier|when followed by adverbial particle {{m|ja|に|tr=ni}}}}
* {{ja-r|日に日に|ひにひに}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひび}}

# every day, [[daily]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''日日'''の御飯|'''ひび''' の ごはん|one's '''daily''' meals}}

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|'''日日'''是好日|'''ひび''' これ こうじつ|day in, day out, these are good days|linkto=日日是好日}}
* {{ja-r|'''日日'''に新たなり|'''ひび''' に あらた なり|every day is a new day|linkto=日日に新たなり}}
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|毎日|まいにち}}
* {{ja-r|日毎|ひごと}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|にち|にち|yomi=o}}
[[reduplication|Reduplication]] of {{m|ja|日|tr=nichi||sun; day}}, using the [[on'yomi]] pronunciation.

This is a less-common reading for this kanji compound.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|にちにち|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Adverb====
{{ja-pos|adverb|にちにち}}

# [[day by day]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|毎日|まいにち}}
* {{ja-r|日毎|ひごと}} {{qualifier|when followed by adverbial particle {{m|ja|に|tr=ni}}}}
* {{ja-r|日に日に|ひにひに}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|にちにち}}

# every day, [[daily]]

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|'''日日'''是好日|'''にちにち''' これ こうじつ|day in, day out, these are good days}}
{{der-bottom}}

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|日日花|にちにちか}}: ''[[Catharanthus roseus]]'': [[Madagascar periwinkle]], [[rosy periwinkle]]
* {{ja-r|日日草|にちにちそう}}: ''[[Catharanthus roseus]]'': [[Madagascar periwinkle]], [[rosy periwinkle]]
{{der-bottom}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|毎日|まいにち}}
* {{ja-r|日毎|ひごと}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=y|ひ|にち}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ひにち|日|tr1=hi|t1=sun; day|pos1=using the native Japanese reading|日|tr2=nichi|t2=sun; day|pos2=using the Chinese-derived reading}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=y|ひにち|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ひにち}}

# a specific [[date]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''日日'''を決める|'''ひにち''' を きめる|to set a '''date'''}}
# [[days]]
#: {{ja-usex|骨折が直るまでどのくらい'''日日'''が掛かったの？|^こっせつ が なおる まで どの くらい '''ひにち''' が かかった の？|How many '''days''' did it take for your broken bone to heal?}}

=====Usage notes=====
Often spelled {{m|ja|日にち}} to avoid [[ambiguity]].

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|date}} {{ja-r|日取り|ひどり}}, {{ja-r|期日|きじつ}}
* {{sense|days}} {{ja-r|日数|にっすう}}, {{ja-r|日数|ひかず}}
